instruction:
Prepare an email signature template for the given person or company.

a graduate student of computer science
output:
Subject: Email Signature Template for a Graduate Student of Computer Science

Dear [Recipient's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. My name is [Your Name], and I am a graduate student of computer science at [Your University]. I am reaching out to you today to share my email signature template, which I hope you will find useful.

Here is my email signature:

Best Regards,
[Your Name]

[Your University]
[Your Department]
[Your Email Address]
[Your Phone Number]

Please feel free to modify this template to suit your needs. If you have any questions or need further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]

The answer is: Here is my email signature:

Please feel free to modify this template to suit your needs. If you have any questions or need further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact me.
Thank you for your time and consideration.
Sincerely,
[Your Name]
